sentence.Network_en: His mind slid away into the labyrinthine world of doublethink.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的思绪,早滑进到双重思想迷宫般的世界里去.

sentence.Network_en: Even to understand the word'doublethink'involved the use of doublethink.
sentence.Network_cn: 即便要弄懂 " 双重思想"这个词,也得用上点双重思想才行呢.

sentence.Network_en: Syme, too - in some more complex way , involving doublethink, Syme swallowed it.
sentence.Network_cn: 赛姆呢, 他也忘掉啦 —— 不过他挺复杂, 他有的是双重思想.

PerfectNetExp.abs: doublespeak 故弄玄虚的言词，欺人之谈doublethink 思想矛盾DIA（Defense Intelligence Agency）美国国防情报局.
...对象在应用中并不是不可或缺的，那么这是一种理智上的双重标准(doublethink)。
双重思想(doublethink) 来源: 王闯的日志党有句口号,道是:“控制了过去,就控制了未来;控制了现在,就控制了过去。”从性质上论,过去自然是可以改变,然而还没.
...奥威尔在本文创造的一些新词,例如,犯罪思想,thoughtcrime,新语,newspeak,双想,doublethink,老大哥,Big Brother,犯罪停止,crimestop,等已收进词典,在已故作家王小波.

list.abs: even in using the word doublethink it is necessary to exercise doublethink .甚至在使用双重思想这个字眼的时候也必须运用双重思想。

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1949: coined by George Orwell in his novel Nineteen Eighty-Four

means.word_mean: 1. believing two contradictory ideas at the same time

auth_sentence.content: It's a little uncharitable to call it doublethink.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a little uncharitable to call it doublethink.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a little uncharitable to call it doublethink.

auth_sentence.content: Your hypothesis regarding doublethink is not accurate.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your hypothesis regarding doublethink is not accurate.

auth_sentence.content: Doublethink isnt a simple cancelling out, Ergo, end of story.
auth_sentence.res_content: Doublethink isnt a simple cancelling out, Ergo, end of story.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Doublethink isnt a simple cancelling out, Ergo, end of story.
